transportAdvice: Catania has a small metro line and an extensive bus network that connects the city centre with major tourist areas, and taxis are readily available at ranks near the main station and airport. The historic centre is compact and walkable, making it easy to explore key sights on foot.

weather.description: Cool and occasionally rainy with mild temperatures, typical of a Mediterranean winter.
Still cool with some rain, but days can be pleasantly mild and sunny between showers.
Spring begins to arrive with warming temperatures and a mix of sun and occasional rain.
Mild and increasingly sunny, making it a pleasant time to explore the city and surroundings.
Warm and mostly dry with long sunny days, ideal for sightseeing and early beach visits.
Hot and dry with abundant sunshine, marking the start of the summer beach season.
Very hot and dry, with intense sun and little to no rainfall throughout the month.
The hottest month of the year, with scorching temperatures and high beach crowds.
Still warm and largely sunny with the occasional early-autumn shower appearing late in the month.
Pleasantly warm with increasing cloud cover and some rain, a comfortable month for sightseeing.
Noticeably cooler with more frequent rain, though mild spells are still common.
Cool and occasionally wet with a festive atmosphere in the city centre around the holidays.
